name: Ant Colony (jase1968)
description:
Ant Colony is a game I'm developing in Gamemaker Studio 2.

Controls are WASD to move, ARROW keys to move one square, shift to run, ctrl to crouch / precise turning, zoom in / out with the mouse wheel.

It uses port 7525 for those who understand port forwarding.

Let me know in the comments if you have any suggestions for the game!
